text: Men avɨrim bar e gafira. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ga uaning. Nɨ izɨ pazɨ me damusɨ akavsiatam me datɨghtɨ, e ti me abɨnɨva men agɨraghtɨ me en nguazim gitagham. Kɨ kamaghɨn fo, nɨ deravɨra gumazibar amusɨ mɨkɨmtɨ, nɨn aseba me damutɨ, me deraghvɨra ikiam. Egh nɨ pazɨ me damusɨ mɨkɨmtɨ, nɨn aseba me damutɨ, me ikuvigham.”
